name: Aliases
description: List of aliases for this property.

name: Calculated
description: Specifies that the property has no in-memory storage allocated for it when the object containing it is instantiated.

name: Cardinality
description: Specifies the cardinality of a relationship property. The Cardinality keyword is required for relationship properties. It is ignored by non-relationship properties.

name: ClientName
description: An alias used by client projections of this property.

name: Deferred
description: For stored computed fields only. True if the computation and filing of this field is deferred.

name: Deprecated
description: True if this property is deprecated.

name: Final
description: Specifies that subclasses cannot override the definition of this property.

name: Identity
description: Specifies that this property is the identity for this class. Identity properties can be set in new objects only and the default is set by incrementing a counter.

name: InitialExpression
description: Specifies an initial value for the property.

name: Internal
description: If true, then do not display this item in automatic documentation.

name: Inverse
description: Specifies the name of the inverse side of a relationship. That is, the name of the corresponding relationship property in the related class. The inverse property must exist in the related class and have the correct Cardinality value. The Inverse keyword is required for relationship properties. It is ignored by non-relationship properties.

name: MultiDimensional
description: Specifies that an attribute has the characteristics of a multidimensional array.

name: OnDelete
description: Specifies what referential action to take when the key value is deleted from the foreign table.

name: Private
description: Specifies that the property is private. Private properties can only be used by instance methods of this class or its subclasses.

name: ReadOnly
description: Specifies that the property is readonly.

name: Required
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies that the value of the property must be given a value before it can be stored to disk.

name: ServerOnly
description: Specifies that a property will not be projected to a Java or C++ client.

name: SqlColumnNumber
description: Explicitly sets the SQL Column number for this property. This is provided for legacy application support.

name: SqlComputeCode
description: Specifies ObjectScript code that evaluates to a computed field value.

name: SqlComputed
description: Specifies that this property is an SQL computed field.

name: SqlComputeOnChange
description: Specifies one or more properties whose modification triggers the recalculation of this computed field within SQL.

name: SqlFieldName
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies the column name used to identify the property in its SQL projection. By default, the SQL column name is the same as the property name.

name: SqlListDelimiter
description: Specifies the delimiter character used within SQL for lists. This is provided for legacy application support.

name: SqlListType
description: specifies the representation to be used for a list.

name: Transient
description: In the case of a persistent class, specifies that the property is not stored in the database.
